content: brighten up your day with this vibrant crochet bucket hat stitched in red heart super saver o go you can easily crochet this hat for a fast and fun accessory colors are perfectly coordinated so all you have to do is focus on the techniques including granny square crocheting in the round patchwork seaming and more explore other o go color combinations for fashionable variations to enhance any outfit yarns for model red heart ™ super saver™ o go™ solids 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m prints 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m main color mc soft navy 7180 1 o go contrast a b c d and e rainbow 7192 1 o go
